name: Dogboot
description:
This silly thing was created in less than 4 hours as a warmup exercise for the upcoming Ludum Dare #23. I just wanted to try writing some box2D game thingie in haXe. 

After a bit of messing with physics, it went well. I like the idea and would like to expand it later – to let the dog jump over obstacles, get powerups to make his body longer in order to get over crevices, mouth-beam powerup, stomping on things… Lost of crazy ideas :)

WHY?

Tools: vim, haXe, GIMP, box2D
Date: 04/2012
